author: Monica Bautista
comment: I love it. The only thing I would like is to change a map event, or maybe I don't know how. But it totally deserves 5 ★

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi Monica- Thanks for your feedback. Do write to us with more details on your request at support@miduapp.com and do join our awesome midu community using this link- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/ and share your midu experience with us.

author: Eric J. Smith
comment: It boogies my mind that I can't schedule a task for a specific time. However, the location and calendar integration is great if you need to be many different places in a day. Just got a suggestion to add a task based on an sms message, which was a little creepy but spot on and useful.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi Eric-Thanks for giving midu a spin :) Just letting you know that you can schedule a task for a specific time by using the "I need to do" option in midu. Do write to us at support@miduapp.com for more questions and do join our FB community to get to know us better- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

author: Reese Mitchell
comment: I love the app it is just missing galaxy s2/3 reminders

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hello- Thanks for your feedback :) Midu currently supports Android Wear watches only and we hope you are enjoying the midu app. Do join us on Facebook and share with us your midu experience- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

author: Kap Phanthavong
comment: I like it

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content:
Hi There,
Thank you for giving midu a try and for your 5-Stars rating :) Do share with us your midu experience and tell us what you liked about midu by joining our Facebook community here- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

author: Savannah Yuen
comment: Cool app I do really like it only problem I had is I mainly got it to use on my watch but when I look to download it on my watch nothing comes up like it doesn't have it and that kind of irritated me since I got it for that reason.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi Savannah- Can you let us know which watch you are using? midu does support watches running on Android Wear. If you have Android Wear 2.0 on your watch you will need to download midu from the Play Store on your watch and then get the watch face. Write to us at support@miduapp.com if you have questions.

author: Tracey Bowyer
comment: This is the best new app I've tried in years.  I especially love the remind me when I'm in the car feature.  Love it!

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi Tracey- Thanks for giving midu a try and providing a great feedback. Hope midu helps you stay organized all the time. Do join our community on Facebook and share more of your midu experience with us- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

author: Michael Gothreau
comment: Best I have tried so far.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi Michael- Thanks for giving midu a try. Do join our cool Facebook community by using this link and tell us what you like about midu- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

comment: So effective and efficient

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi There- Thanks for giving midu a try. We appreciate your feedback a lot. It will be great if you can take a moment to join our cool Facebook community and share more of your midu experience with us- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

author: Wilma Williams
comment: This app is just what I need in my life. I love the reminder to leave to get to my meeting on time. Before I found this app. I was notoriously late for everything. When I arrived to a location before a friend, she pointed out, "But you're always late." 🤣 Not any more.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi There- We are go glad that midu is able to help you stay punctual with its timely reminders. Hope you continue to get the best out of midu :)

author: Gaby Lopez
comment: Excellent i love it, BUT it would more than perfect, having a graphic calendar in it.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi Gaby- Appreciate your feedback and your 5 star suggestion :) we will definitely take it into consideration.

author: Ernst Mendoza
comment: Great way to organize the day

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi Ernst- Thanks for the 5 stars and we are glad midu helps you stay organized. Please do take a moment to join our awesome community on Facebook and share your midu experience with us there- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

author: Alexandra Bisson
comment: Absolutely fantastic app. Not perfect yet, but it seems to be quite new, so I'll wait and see what the dev team comes up with! Small critic : I'd love to have the option to customize the desktop widget appearance, as it really clashes with the theme installed on my phone. Other than that, I'm obsessed.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi There- Thanks for giving midu a spin. We appreciate your feedback and will definitely consider it for our future versions. We would love it if you could join our cool Facebook community and share your midu experience with us- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

author: Magon Crittenden
comment: Really, really enjoyed this app. For a few weeks. Until last week or so, when an update came through, and my none of my reminders go off when they're supposed to. It's not until I check the app to see when I'm supposed to be reminded, that it decides to remind me of what I needed to do. Not helpful anymore.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content:
Hi Magon - thanks for giving midu a try. We suspect that your app is has been put to "sleep mode" and that is why your reminder notifications are not coming through. The midu support team will contact you to help resolve this as soon as possible.

Please do write to us at support@miduapp.com so we can schedule a call with you to resolve your issue.

author: Amanda Budry
comment: I love this app, it truly is like a personal assistant!!!

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Thank You Amanda for your great feedback. We appreciate it a lot. Please do take a moment to join our midu community on Facebook and share your midu experience with us there- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

comment: Great app beautiful UI

comment: It works well with my scheduling needs

author: Jamie Jamie
comment: The app would be perfect if it did work on my Samsung s3 Frontier. But after reading reviews I learned that it is not compatible with my watch. What a bummer! But this is a Samsung issue. Great job on the  app! I like it enough to keep it anyway. Works great on my Pixel.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi Jamie- Thanks for the awesome feedback and we are glad that midu is a great fit for your Pixel. It is indeed made to function well with Android Wear watches. We would appreciate it if you can join us on Facebook and share more of your experience there- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

author: Phil Toscano
comment: This app is perfect for me. I drive from appointment to appointment and this application will allow me to add reminders while driving and integrates with Android Wear and my new smartwatch. Its face on my SmartWatch allows me to plan my time much more better.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi Phil- Thanks for your great input, very happy to know that you enjoy the midu Android wear watch face as well. We hope that midu helps you in every way and we would really appreciate it if you can join our Facebook community and share more of your experience with us- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

author: Mr Jaffer
comment: Good app and works well.  Would be good if the app had its own notification sound rather than use the lengthy default alarm clock tone

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi Mr. Jaffer- Thank you for your feedback. We are working on a solution that will enable using a different notification sound for midu alarms. So stay tuned for more updates and do join our Facebook community here- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

author: Donna Warren
comment: Can't enter app without giving permission to contact list.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hello Donna- We do understand your concern, however, one of the core features of midu is the ability to send smart reminders to your contacts and you need to give permission to the contacts lists to fulfill this purpose. We assure you that we do not use the contacts lists information for anything else. Hope this helps :)

author: Forrest Cicogni
comment: Awesome app. Wee thought out.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi There- Thanks for your awesome feedback. We certainly hope that midu helps you stay organized in every way:). It will be great if you would take a minute to join our Facebook community and share your midu experience with us- https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

author: Michelle Sy
comment: In short, if I wanted to take a look at past days to-dos, prep, drive times all things on the day of prior to appointment, I can't even do that. I have my dad & son's appts along with my own, work and personal things to manage and often times I need to look back on days. On this alone, I'll have to delete. Love the concept and it did help me in many ways, visually organized my days but I need more: it: link to emails if I'm prepping for meeting and need to refer to it.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content:
Hi There- Thank You for giving midu a try and sharing your feedback with us. 
 At midu we are focused on assisting users with the upcoming tasks and events of the day. We appreciate the feedback and will see how we can improve the app to also manage past activities from previous days.

author: Madi Murray
comment: My only complaint is that I can't add tasks that go into the next day. For example, if I'm working from 1530-0030 the next day,  I just have to stop my day in Midu at 1159. It's a small complaint, but having that consistency between Midu and my actual day would make it 5 stars

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi Madi- Thanks for sharing your thoughts with us. We will definitely take your request into consideration. We would love to have you join our Facebook community and share your midu experience with us: https://www.facebook.com/groups/729833497177455/

author: William Arnold
comment: The app does not work with Samsung Gear 3 as the watch face is not accessible on that device

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hi There- midu is only supported on Samsung smart watches that are compatible with the Android Wear platform. Samsung watches running on Tizen are not compatible with midu at this time. Supported Samsung smart watches are- Samsung Gear Live, Samsung Gear 2 Neo.

author: mike pitman
comment: Getting a weird bug where some of the screens only show half of what they're supposed to not sure if this is a glitch or something wrong on my end otherwise seems like a really good app.

reply.author: miduapp
reply.content: Hey, sorry to hear that. Make sure that you are using a Normal font size for midu on your phone, as midu supports normal fonts. If you have questions please write to support@miduapp.com and we will be happy to help you :)

comment: wish the alarm would sound even when your phone is on silent or at least have that option.
